snippet: Gunmen threw grenades at a Sufi Islamic religious gathering on Sunday in the port city of Karachi and then opened fire on the people assembled to offer prayers, killing eight, officials said.
lead_paragraph: Gunmen threw grenades at a Sufi Islamic religious gathering on Sunday in the port city of Karachi and then opened fire on the people assembled to offer prayers, killing eight, officials said.

headline.main: 8 Killed in Attack on Sufi Gathering
headline.print_headline: 8 Killed in Attack On Sufi Gathering
